components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Manages incoming traffic and routes it to appropriate services, providing a single point of entry for the application.

components.name: Web App
components.description: The main application hosted on Azure, processing user requests and serving application content.

components.name: Azure SQL Database
components.description: Stores application data securely and provides data retrieval and storage capabilities.

components.name: Azure Active Directory
components.description: Manages user identities and access, providing authentication and authorization services.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Protects the web application from common threats and vulnerabilities, ensuring secure access.

data_flows.description: Users initiate requests that are processed through the Application Gateway.
The Application Gateway routes traffic to the Web App for processing.
The Web App retrieves and stores data in the Azure SQL Database.
Azure Active Directory provides authentication tokens to the Web App for user access.

trust_boundaries.name: User Access Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between end-users and the application services, ensuring secure access management.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Security Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary protecting data storage and access, ensuring data is secured and managed appropriately.
